description: Configuration schema for SnapsInAZfs.json configuration file

$id.description: The name of the config file. SnapsInAZfs expects to see 'SnapsInAZfs.json'.

DryRun.description: If SnapsInAZfs will perform a dry run and make no changes to ZFS.

TakeSnapshots.description: If running SnapsInAZfs will take snapshots by default

PruneSnapshots.description: If running SnapsInAZfs will prune expired snapshots by default

LocalSystemName.description: The name of the local system, which will be set in the snapsinazfs.com:sourcesystem zfs property of objects created on this system

ZfsPath.description: The path to the zfs utility

ZpoolPath.description: The path to the zpool utility

Daemonize.description: If SnapsInAZfs will run as a service

DaemonTimerIntervalSeconds.description: The number of seconds between timer events when running as a service

Templates.description: Templates to apply to dataset nodes

Monitoring.description: Configuration section for configurable formatting options for monitoring.
